titleStmt.title: The last words and testimonies of and for William Allen, late of Cowen in Essex, a faithfull servant of the Lord; who finishing his testimony, departed this life the 21. of the 11th month, 1679.
titleStmt.author: Allen, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Benjamin Clark ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
